QuestData.Title: The Pupil Returns
QuestData.Description:
Now that you have your disguise--and I have assurance of your loyalty--it is time you reported to your new master.
Find Kel'Thuzad within the Vault of Souls. Do whatever tasks he requires of you, but keep your eyes open for anything untoward.
My oculus will continue to accompany you so that I can provide guidance when the time is right.
We will uncover this new baron's true intentions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Kel'Thuzad within the Vault of Souls.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, you've returned. I take it the ritual went well?
Come, we have much to accomplish.
